titles.title: A bill to amend the Flood Control Act of 1954 to authorize the Secretary of the Armey to carry out bank erosion measures along the White, Black, and Little Red Rivers, Arkansas.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.
Referred to Subcommittee on Water Resources.

bill.summary: 10/4/1988--Introduced. Amends the Flood Control Act of 1954 to authorize the Secretary of the Army to take measures to alleviate bank erosion and related problems which constitute a threat to life and property along the White, Black, and Little Red Rivers, Arkansas.
